description:
Female ice hockey players in the UK, some as young as 14, are being forced to compete against biologically male transgender competitors in women's leagues.

The post Parents Fearful of “Dangerous” Risk Posed by Trans Ice Hockey Players in U.K. Women’s Leagues appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Parents Fearful of “Dangerous” Risk Posed by Trans Ice Hockey Players in U.K. Women’s Leagues

description:
Labour's energy policy just doesn't stack up, says David Turver. Better for Keir Starmer to take his Great British Energy plans, and its logo, to a darkened room with a bottle of whisky and a revolver.

The post Labour’s Great British Energy Suicide Note appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Labour’s Great British Energy Suicide Note

description:
Prof Ian Plimer has long railed against the climate consensus. Hannes Sarv talks to the geological gadfly about misinformation, global boiling and why the only thing renewable about renewable energy is the subsidies.

The post To Use Terms Like “Global Boiling” Is Clearly Absolute Nonsense appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: To Use Terms Like “Global Boiling” Is Clearly Absolute Nonsense

description:
An NHS official is urging the organisation to embrace more gender categories, arguing that recognising diverse identities enhances inclusion and tackles inequality.

The post We Should Have More Gender Categories, Says NHS Abuse Services Chief appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: We Should Have More Gender Categories, Says NHS Abuse Services Chief

description:
Ex-teacher Paul Sutton says Labour's 'skills-based curriculum' will be a disaster. He knows. He was forced to teach it when Labour was last in power.

The post Labour’s Skills-Based Curriculum Was a Disaster, Says Ex-Teacher. So Why Bring it Back? appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Labour’s Skills-Based Curriculum Was a Disaster, Says Ex-Teacher. So Why Bring it Back?

description:
In a campaign trail piece in the Sunday Times, Farage tells the journalist he wants Reform to absorb the rump of the Conservative Party after the election and form a new centre-right party.

The post Nigel Farage Plans Tory ‘Takeover’ After Election appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Nigel Farage Plans Tory ‘Takeover’ After Election

description:
Edinburgh's ad ban targetting fossil fuels for climate justice is the latest Net Zero nonsense funded by UK100 billionaires, says Chris Morrison. It's not about the climate, is it?

The post ‘Climate Justice’ Now Requires Edinburgh City Council to Ban Ads Tempting Locals to Go on a Cruise appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: ‘Climate Justice’ Now Requires Edinburgh City Council to Ban Ads Tempting Locals to Go on a Cruise

description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up
